definition: to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]
see 注射針|注射针[zhu4 she4 zhen1]

sentences.english: Smith also designed a special needle and a needle sharpener.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯也設計了一個特殊的針和一個注射針研磨器。

sentences.english: She expertly slid the hypodermic needle into my vein.
sentences.chinese: 她熟練地把注射針插入我的靜脈裏。

sentences.english: A needle was thrust into his arm.
sentences.chinese: 注射針頭刺入他的前臂。

sentences.english: In the United States, the most common cause of infection is sharing drug-injection needles.
sentences.chinese: 在美國，最常見的感染原因是吸毒共用注射針頭。

sentences.english: But he improper injection needle disposal was found.
sentences.chinese: 但是我們發現了注射針的儲備不當。

sentences.english: Needles and scalpels are especially dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 注射針頭和手術刀尤爲危險。
